title: I need an opinion

replies.body: I'm pretty partial to {{champion:498}} myself out of those, but if you're good with high skill champs I would totes pickup {{champion:142}} !!

> {{champion:74}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:114}}  if you like playing dirty

I might go with Fiona or herm
{{champion:21}}  always a good rank machine in adc
I might wait till she goes in for the free rotation to test her but yeah shes pretty fun ive heard
press R win the game XD
